EmailTemplate.name: LE-202211-HP-TAR-HEV-Blues-Peer-Insights.invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at Blues Peer Insights 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Blues Peer Insights 2022 November 2-3 Orlando, FL You are invited to a unique event Teladoc Health is hosting specifically for its Blues partners! We are bringing together Blues peers from all over the country to gather and build connections through networking, innovation and collaboration. Over the course of this day-and-a-half event we hope to come out with bigger and better ideas for how we can serve your populations. Topics will include: - Key trends shaping virtual care - Virtual primary care and virtual‑first - Vendor evaluation and fatigue - Best practices for ASO team collaboration - Maximizing success for virtual care strategies We hope you'll join your fellow Blues peers at this invitation‑only event. Space is limited so register today! Your stay is on us! Lake Nona Wave Hotel 6100 Wave Hotel Dr., Orlando, FL 32827 (407) 675-2000 Book now <[[https://be.synxis.com/?adult=1&arrive=2022-10-31&chain=25042&child=0&config=Group&currency=USD&depart=2022-11-03&group=2022453&hotel=35155&level=hotel&locale=en-US&rooms=1&theme=Alternate%20Theme]]> Have general event questions? Please reach out to Sudesh Punchoo at sudesh.punchoo@teladochealth.com <mailto:sudesh.punchoo@teladochealth.com> About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Rd., Purchase, NY 10577
